website_summaries.verdict: A pack of 100 individually packed pills capable of treating up to 200 quarts of questionable water.
pros: Aquatabs can be used in emergency situations or to treat water that was collected from rain, rivers, lakes, wells, or other similar sources
Tablets require approximately 40 minutes to fully treat water
This product is effective against bacteria
cons: Although the individual tablets arrive in sealed packets, it can be disconcerting receiving 100 packets that were shipped in a ziplock plastic bag

customer_reviews.title: expiration date of sept 2022
customer_reviews.text: 9/4/2018 haven't used them yet, so FOUR stars. BUT the expiration date on these is SEPT 2022. exp 4 years, not 5 as advertised so MINUS ONE MORE STAR. update : 9/7/2018 got replacement today and the expiration date AGAIN is sept 2022 FOUR YEARS not FIVE AS ADVERTISED. NOT worth the trouble. Why don't they lower the price another $1 to $4 because $1 is how much I am losing by having this last only 4 years. Is anybody getting the stuff that is good for 5 years ?
customer_reviews.author: P H

customer_reviews.title: YOUR survival is YOUR responsibility.
customer_reviews.text: I am compiling a Bug Out Bag [BOB] for every family car. I included these as a key component. My thoughts: expecting [or just hoping] that others will come to your rescue during a natural disaster like flood, hurricane, or a forest fire, or even just a stranded auto ... is not enough. YOUR survival is YOUR responsibility. While putting these BOB's in every car might not be the best location, having them ready is the first step, knowing where they are located is the second step. Hint: I actually plan to store each in a water-resistant plastic ammo box ["Plano"], that includes all items ... plus a small backpack for easy "no hands" carrying. Dave@Texas
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Old stock
customer_reviews.text: The product has a 5 year shelf life, mine expires in 3 yr and 1 month. Disappointed that they are sending old stock.
customer_reviews.author: one2many

customer_reviews.title: Comes in very handy for hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my trek in Nepal (Mar 29 - Apr 8). Used 1 tablet in a 1 liter bottle of local (clear) water. Worked great. Water tasted fine and so avoided having to buy water (and create plastic waste) as we trekked.
customer_reviews.author: home theater guy

customer_reviews.title: Almost outdated when you get them
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with these. With a shelf life of only 5 years, you would expect to receive something that is not already 3 years old. This is Feb of 2014 and the manufacture date on the ones I received are June of 2011. Won't be buying them from here again. Update: Contacted the seller and they promptly issued a full refund. Hope they check the dates on stuff like this before they ship it out. Customer service was all that could be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Noknocks

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking and camping
customer_reviews.text: Better to be safe than sorry. Bought these for hiking/camping emergencies in the instance that one runs out of clean packaged water.Tried one beforehand at home, easy to use. Saw no difference in the taste of the water itself. These tablets in a 100 pack will purify a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These tablets purify water
customer_reviews.text: Ultra lightweight, very easy to use, and effective (so far). I've used these for backcountry backpacking, and they work great. So far have only used these to purify water from clear mountain lakes and rivers/streams. So far I've not gotten sick, but I have not tried to use these with turbid (muddy) or stagnant water. 1 pack (2 of the tiny tablets) per 1 quart or 1 liter (a 1-liter Nalgene bottle...) of water and give it at least 30 minutes. Slight chlorine taste at first, but it either fades or I get taste blind to it after purified water has set for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days before it even shipped out, but once it shipped it came in quick. Smaller tabs than I expected but I think that's a plus. My batch had an expiration date of 01/2022.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good value good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 200 water tablets and for me they're just backup because I've also got a water filter and also I boil my water if I go camping so I try to have at least three methods to produce drinkable water you never know what your water source might be it might just be a very disgusting puddle in the middle of nowhere so you really need as many ways to sterilize your water as possible you don't want to get sick and this is definitely a method that I have in my backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed as I feel that is false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Just wondering why description says 100 tablets treats 200 quarts but when I received product it says 100 tablets treats 100 quarts. That is half the amount. I am disappointed as I feel that is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia J Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: What is the value of individually packaged pills if they have no instructions. description, or even the product name on them? The name Aquatabs does not line up when you cut them. I had to use a pen and add 1 Pill to 1 Pint of water on each package.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: Safe water
customer_reviews.text: My well water isn't the best; and maybe not even safe to cook with... I treat a few gallons a day, and run it through an Aquapure filter.. Long as I can detect a chlorine odor from prefiltered water, I feel safe.. The filtered product is perfectly clear, and neutral in all tests... I feel safe. Although Aquatabs are tiny, and the blister-packs are frustrating: they are easier than adding Clorox...-pp
customer_reviews.author: P. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Did not get sick :-)
customer_reviews.text: I had to drink so questionable water. Never got sick.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Just a little over 3 years on the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G. Bayham

customer_reviews.title: I DON'T LIKE THAT THE MIXING RATIO IS NOT WRITTEN ON THE ...
customer_reviews.text: I DON'T LIKE THAT THE MIXING RATIO IS NOT WRITTEN ON THE TABLET PACKAGING. I HAD TO CUT OUT THE INSTRUCTIONS AND TAKE THEM BACKPACKING TO MAKE SURE I GOT IT RIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Wrasler

customer_reviews.title: These appear to be repackaged into 100 pills to a ...
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be repackaged into 100 pills to a ziplock bag with directions and a business card. While each pill is individually sealed it is not normal for items meant for human consumption to be sold this way. I will keep for now as they are meant for last ditch emergency. Oh and mine expire in 4 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Paw_Paw_Drew

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently travelled to Morocco, where it is advised not to use tap water for drinking or brushing teeth and only buy bottled water (so bad for the environment!!). I decided to go for these tablets, which consistently got positive reviews. SO HAPPY I BOUGHT THESE!!! So easy to use and our drinking water tasted fine. One tablet for every 2L of water, wait 30 minutes and you’re good to go. We bought a couple gallon jugs of water and reused them to treat water. Saved a lot of money, didn’t get sick from contaminated water, and helped the environment. Win-win-win!
customer_reviews.author: leilani nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, just in case.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for emergencies. If it is a 5 yr.old shelf life then mine were made just last year so I don't feel like I have old stock. I would probably still trust em' anyway if they were a few yrds old past. Like I said, emergencies or just to carry around in case I run out of water hiking or camping. Hope I never have to use them but, nice to have. They were delivered fast with my other items.
customer_reviews.author: electronTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Safe Water
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to keep on hand for an emergency in case a disaster happens. Can use this product to make water safe to drink in case normal water supply is. Unavailable. Excellent product for all campers or hunters need to get safe drinking water in areas where there needed
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: AN HONEST REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know the efficacy of this product, because I haven"t encountered the need to use it & hope I won't have to. But at this point, the way the world is spiraling with unexpected crisis -- be prepared for the unexpected & purchase it..... Just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Caiya D.

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for in setting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in setting up my hiking vest with a little emergency water purification. They were something slim and lightweight that I could fit in it's pockets without the weight of a filter or the little purification pills in the brown bottles.
customer_reviews.author: The Last Boy Scout

customer_reviews.title: Each Tablet purifies 0.75 liters of water in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: These came as 10 rows of 5 tablets each in a tear-open packaging. Each Tablet purifies 0.75 liters of water in 30 minutes. I split these up between emergency packs so having them in smaller divisions of rows was convenient.
customer_reviews.author: K. CarriereTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Clean machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep my water clean in my rowing machine and they are perfect. Love that it came with so many! I have enough tablets to last me...oh I dunno...the next 20 years maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Norris

customer_reviews.title: Floppyears2
customer_reviews.text: These Aquatabs Water Purification Tablets were a donation for the Orlando Florida Food Bank which sent food and personal items to the people of Puerto Rico..I was surprised to have found them on your site..GOD always has a plan..everything left the Jacksonville Florida Naval Base the middle of October..I am sure that the supplies donated were well received since they seem to be still in dire need of everything.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: Not good! This is what the pill came in a little plastic bag! If I knew this I would never buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Quan T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any of this batch of tablets but I've used them in the past. They seem to do what they say they will. I've never had any ill effects from water treated with them. It appears these are bought in bulk and repackaged by the supplier. While that may be a concern to others it isn't for me. Expiration date is Jan 2022.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to have a 5 year self-life, but I just got my order and it's expiring in July 2023...so that's like half of what I should be getting. That's pretty bad marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Cal from Cali

customer_reviews.title: works amazing the only reason it is not 5 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: i used them as soon as i got them and they did not have much of an after taste so they will be quite pleasant in the field. also no intestinal distress afterwards as well. works amazing the only reason it is not 5 stars is no cryptosporidium filtering.
customer_reviews.author: Trell

customer_reviews.title: Every one should have one of these pills in there billfold
customer_reviews.text: They are great for emergency use especially to have in my billfold just in case i find my self stranded some where with no water filter
customer_reviews.author: Clifford James Green Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Strong chlorine flavor
customer_reviews.text: I want to think these pills work, I have used them on my 5 days trip to Boundary Waters at North Minnesota and had them as back up in case my filter fails. I have used the pills a couple times just to give them a try and they add an strong chlorine flavor to the water. It is hard to make sure the pills actually work so I am giving 4 stars assuming they do purify the water
customer_reviews.author: Simon Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Compact and extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact. Easily fits in any size pack or pouch. So light you'll never realize it's there.
customer_reviews.author: timothy b. christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. I have enough to last forever for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a hot deal....better than the retail 30 packs. Expiration date was 2021. No particular aftertaste. I use the Evernew 2000 water bottles for backpacking. One tablet per 2 quarts. Don't need a water filter anymore. Just a Sawyer while on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: Very handy in emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven’t used this particular brand, I have had to use a similar type in the past and I can tell you when the power and water go out they are good to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Miller

customer_reviews.title: We’ll  see
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my bug out bag. Hope they work when I need them
customer_reviews.author: FurBabyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Good to have on hand and for camping. We often have watermain breaks so.....great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great taste poor treatment ratio
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great alternative to an iodine tablet. It tastes like tap water, really no taste at all. The only complaint I have is that 1 tablet treats .75 liters of water. This ratio just doesn’t make sense to me as if you need to treat one liter then you have to break apart a tablet. Would be a five star if they fixed the treatment size.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works...really “bleachy”
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Cancun Mexico to rinse our toothbrushes. Also to gargle with. It smelled like opening up a bottle of bleach. The water was undrinkable in my opinion...it took 2 days for the water to be “normal”
customer_reviews.author: elaina

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work
customer_reviews.text: I'm healthy, so they must work! And they are very convenient. We stash them in the backpacks and 1st aid kit, as you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Mugwhamp

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared!
customer_reviews.text: If we ever have to use the water from the river by our house, we can drink it safely after adding these. Our well runs on electricity, which occasionally goes off, so we are prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Doc W8

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your bug out bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bough these for my bug out bag to use in an emergency situation of clean water supplies are low. These work great and work in under 30 minutes! Only a few tablets gets you clean drinking water with no weird taste. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to put in my hurricane kit. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in my hurricane kit. I live in a coastal hurricane region in Florida and have been thru many in my 71 years. It,s cheap backup to these sorts of things if the poop hits the fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best value in chemical disinfetion tabkets, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: These are the same purification tablets one gets issued in the US Army. One tablet does two quarts. The price is certainly right!
customer_reviews.author: Bret Smith

customer_reviews.title: No bad flavor to the water
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're supposed to do. No bad flavor to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Clean water never tasted better.
customer_reviews.text: I added these to the water that I filter to drink. Even works on swamp water.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Vanas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bug out bag
customer_reviews.text: I got these tablets for my bug out bag and they're perfect. They come with instructions and in a waterproof baggie!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cassell

customer_reviews.title: Small package, very light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I actually hope I'll never have to use these. However, if I ever do find myself needing them, I'm glad these are foil packaged so nicely because I'll be carrying them in my EDC bag.
customer_reviews.author: L. South

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! Super light and they only take 30 minutes to work. I use these for summer alpine climbing when I can fill my water at a stream, pop in a tab and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use these yet but I'm glad we have them, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just in case !
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and just what I needed for my get home bag. I take them camping and fishing with me and of course I hope I do not need them, but having them is better than not.!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Experation date 01/2022. I have almost 5 yrs until experation. Love the packaging of 10 to a strip. Can package seperately. Includes multiple slips on how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Aley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy way to assure that you are prepared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy way to assure that you are prepared to treat water. Just stick a strip or two in every daypack and purse, and if that earthquake happens today you will at least not have to go thirsty.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1 liter tabs are more convenient. I prefer this brand because of taste.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Hope I don't need to use this in the event of a nuclear war
customer_reviews.text: Use by date was Oct 2021. Made in Ireland. Everything is at is should be, with clear instructions and the waterproof plastic packaging is nice for storing.
customer_reviews.author: abc123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking-camping in the wilderness!
customer_reviews.text: Received undamaged, expiration dates well forward (2021). Do not plan to use until early spring but I have used these before with no issues. Like that there is no aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Smokepole

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet, but they are as advertised. Lots of tablets and very convenient for backpacking & emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L

customer_reviews.title: I think it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I took it to overseas, I think it didn't work for me. I had a feeling bad stomach all the time, two years ago I took this with me, from Amazon store that one worked.
customer_reviews.author: Excesslines New York

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A lot more protective measures needed to use these then I expected, but they seem to work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent use for our canoe''s and kayak's as well as our bug out bags. loud, j
customer_reviews.author: jhud

customer_reviews.title: They Work Well...
customer_reviews.text: They work for their intended used. I do wish they were available in slightly larger sizes for bigger amounts of water.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: You never know!!
customer_reviews.text: If you go out in to the woods you need to be prepared!! Enough to put in your packs and haver sack !!!
customer_reviews.author: SIXGUNZ*USA

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Light and great to have in case of emergency in a Bug Out Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Clos The Clown

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible but you get used to and a must have ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these often. Taste is horrible but you get used to and a must have for backcountry excursions.....
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have this for an emergency. We have power and electric go out water not safe to drink
customer_reviews.author: Sue bug 670

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a bad taste, as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: A week in Yellowstone drinking creek and river water and I am here to write about it. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: trdally

customer_reviews.title: I use Aquatabs in conjunction with a Sawyer filter. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Aquatabs in conjunction with a Sawyer filter. The filter gets protozoa that the halogen can't kill. Plus, the halogen gets viruses the filter won't eliminate.
customer_reviews.author: Reid F. Tillery

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: You can never be too prepared, i store 55 gallons times 4 in shed of water, these keep it clean! And algae free
customer_reviews.author: Just_a_DadTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Safe drinking water for Puerto Rico.
customer_reviews.text: These tablets we're life savers, as they provided safe drinking water for five families in Puerto Rico after hurricane Maria. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: It's a deal for the money and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This item is very important to have especially when you don't want to drink regular water before you purification
customer_reviews.author: Poncemaxflow

customer_reviews.title: great product to have around
customer_reviews.text: great product to have around. You never know what can happen to your drinking water to make it unsafe to drink. With these tablets on hand gives me a piece of mind
customer_reviews.author: joe kuzmitch

customer_reviews.title: But good for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for emergency preparedness. They expire too soon for my taste. Don't know how they are cause I won't use them unless I have to. But good for emergencies. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jefflyn Woodley

customer_reviews.title: Just in Case
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for my 'just in case' box. Packaged well and with clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for bug out
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small, light and ideal for a camping/bug out bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased these before, and I didn't know they are SO tiny. Just a little smaller than a baby aspirin. That's great, actually, because then they don't take up too much space. 2020 expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ... use it and hopefully never will but they look like they are supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it and hopefully never will but they look like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started a survival pack and this was one of the first item's. What I expected and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: very nice deal.
customer_reviews.text: Price point was very good, expiration date is just short of 5 years out, packing in a plastic bag was fine with me. I haven't used any yet, I have no idea what they taste like.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried. Hope I never need to. Bought them to be prepared for hurricanes.
customer_reviews.author: kathy quilts

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are just what they say they are. Great to have for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quantity. Have not use them yet so no information there.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Handy stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good for campers. Sending some to West Africa where there is a shortage of potable water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received fast and all of them have years before the expiration date!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Always good if the SHTF
customer_reviews.text: Always good if the SHTF. You will be able to purify your own water for survival. That is the key.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have these as part of my emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: safe water
customer_reviews.text: I received 100 tabs that will expire in 2019, each one will treat 2 quarts of water. The shipping cost more than the tabs. I'm going to a 3rd world country and the reassurance that our water will be safe to drink is worth a lot more than I paid by far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Crouse

customer_reviews.title: not something I'd want to drink everyday
customer_reviews.text: Crushed up one tablet in 2 quarts of water, to see what it would taste like .. not bad.. the date was good on my packages as opposed to other reviews. and I'd trust it for purification.. from Wikipedia It is mainly used as a disinfectant, biocide, industrial deodorant and detergent. It is found in some modern water purification tablets/filters. It is more efficient than formerly used halazone water disinfectant. In these applications, it is a source of slow release of chlorine in low concentrations at a relatively constant rate. As a disinfectant, it is used to sterilize drinking water, swimming pools, tableware and air, fight against infectious diseases as routine disinfection.
customer_reviews.author: Kable

customer_reviews.title: one or two?
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine from UPS today. Was an extra week for some reason than the rest of the order, but that is ok. Was looking at the instructions and I am kinda puzzled. Large light green label says clearly that you get '100 tablets enough to treat 100 quarts of water from rivers and lakes', yet the MSDS looking sheet inside says "One Aquatabs tablet will produce a 2.6ppm available chlorine solution when dissolved in two quarts of water." So do they treat one or two quarts of water? They are good till 07/2021.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very practical for trips to places with contaminated water. ...
customer_reviews.text: very practical for trips to places with contaminated water. the pakage gives you all instructions. its bit expensive but worth to have it because it is ease to take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in Ziploc bag very questionable
customer_reviews.text: I got the amount of tablets but they came in a ziploc bag I found that very weird and makes me question the authenticity and reliability of the tablets.
customer_reviews.author: jakmims137

customer_reviews.title: It's a very easy thing to gift to those who are not as ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a friend who is going to Africa to give to the people there. It's a very easy thing to gift to those who are not as fortunate as we are to have clean drinking water. It's a product that makes such a big impact yet doesn't take up any space in your suitcases during your travel.
customer_reviews.author: ana maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and store. Have not gotten sick, so assume they work.
customer_reviews.author: Gylmeh

customer_reviews.title: The dissolve easily even in cold water
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a camping trip to treat 5 gallon totes of water. The dissolve easily even in cold water. After letting the totes sit over night there was no odor or taste to the treated water. These certainly gave me peace of mind knowing that my family was going to get ill from the drinking water....now my camp cooking is another story....
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Elbel

customer_reviews.title: H2O purifying, have these on hand, always...
customer_reviews.text: have several packs of water purifying tablets, just in case the grid goes down and water is not clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: 100 liters of clean water for $10. Could save your life also thats really all that needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Beram

customer_reviews.title: Good Emergency Provision
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to have around in case of a water shortage, a visit to Flint, Michigan, or a camping trip when you might have to drink lake water.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Better Safe Than Sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to tell you, I haven't used them yet but from the research that I did I pretty much trust them enough to keep them in case of emergencies. It's one of those things that's best to have When you need it and not have to wait for it to comer in the mail, if there is a natural disaster there is no telling how quickly you could get them if at all.
customer_reviews.author: SECRET SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. It's really nice to have individually wrapped tablets. You can cut the package easily, just to have a few to hide in your wallet or on a key ring. Much more convenient and portable than liquid iodine or a bottle of tablets.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Useful to stick a few in a first aide kit.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the least expensive water purification tablets on the market, but the directions are a little hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Mona M. Everett, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on 100 tabs
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on 100 tabs. They are in my bug out bag, first aid kits and auto emergency kits.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday guy

product_meta.title: Aquatabs AQT100 Water Purification Tablets (Pack of 100)
product_meta.description: Emergencies happen, be prepared. Aquatabs are used by all major aid agencies, ngo's and peacekeeping defense forces worldwide for the treatment of human drinking water in emergency situations. They are used by NATO and many other military organizations. Aquatabs are effervescent tablets which kill micro-organisms in water to prevent cholera, typhoid, dysentery and other water borne disease. This 100 Pack treats up to 200 quarts of water. This product is recommended for disinfecting raw or pre-treated water. The source of water to be treated may be collected rain, rivers, lakes, wells, cisterns or similar sources.
